PRE-CHORUS

[E]Siyyon desh hamaara hai desh [G#m]Rahte hain [C#m]hum par[B]desh [F#m]Jayenge [B]hum apne [A]desh ...x2

CHORUS

[E]Hallelujah, halle[A]lujah… [F#m]Halle[B]lujah, [E]hallelujah ...x2

Repeat Pre-Chorus

VERSE 1

[E]Dukh jo [F#m]hamaare [G#m]yahaan [B]Na honge [A]phir [E]vahaan ...x2

[A]Saare dukhon ka [G#m]aant hoga ...x2

[F#m]Dukh ke ye [D]ansoon [B]Yeeshu [E]ponchhega ...x2

VERSE 2

[A]Yahaan ke sukhon ka [B]aant hoga

[F#m]Vahaan ke [D]sukhon ka [B]aant na hoga ...x2

[F#m]Anant [D]jeevan [B]humko [E]milega
